33 // TODO: Implement constraints, constraint flags
34 
35 
38 enum class PhysicsJointType {
39  kFixed = 0, // Positions and orientations of contraint frames are the same
40  kSpherical, // The origins of the actors contraint frames are coincident
41  kRevolute, // Remove all but one rotational degree of freedom between objects (like a door hinge)
42  kPrismatic, // Prevents all rotational motion, but allows origin of actor1's frame to move freely along the x-acis of actor0's (like a stepper motor)
43  kDistance, // Keeps the origins of the constraint frames within a certain radius of distance
44  kD6, // Fixed by default, but individual DOFs can be unlocked to permit any combination of rotations/translations along XYZ axes
45  kCustom // User-specified
46 };
47 
48 enum class PhysicsJointActorIndex {
49  kActor0 = physx::PxJointActorIndex::eACTOR0,
50  kActor1,
51  COUNT
52 };
53 
54 // TODO: Implement breaking
56 class PhysicsJoint: public Object, public Serializable {
57 public:
58  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
61 
63 
64 
65  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
68  PhysicsJoint();
69  virtual ~PhysicsJoint();
71 
72  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
75 
76  virtual PhysicsJointType jointType() const = 0;
77 
78  const char* getName(const char* name) const {
79  checkJoint();
80  return m_pJoint->getName();
81  }
82  void setName(const char* name) {
83  checkJoint();
84  return m_pJoint->setName(name);
85  }
86 
88  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
91 
93  template<typename T>
94  T* as() const {
95  static_assert(std::is_base_of_v<physx::PxJoint, T>, "Class must be a subclass of physx::PxActor");
96  return dynamic_cast<T*>(m_joint);
97  }
98 
100  void setActors(const PhysicsActor& a1, const PhysicsActor& a2);
101 
103 
104  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
107 
109  QJsonValue asJson(const SerializationContext& context = SerializationContext::Empty()) const override;
110 
112  virtual void loadFromJson(const QJsonValue& json, const SerializationContext& context = SerializationContext::Empty()) override;
113 
115 
116  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
120  const char* className() const override { return "PhysicsJoint"; }
121 
123  const char* namespaceName() const override { return "rev::PhysicsJoint"; }
124 
126 
127 protected:
128  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
131 
132 
134  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
137 
141  template<auto EnumVal, typename ...Types>
142  physx::PxJoint* createJoint(const Types&... types) {
143  return createJoint_impl<decltype(EnumVal), EnumVal>(types...);
144  }
145  template<typename EnumType, EnumType EnumValue, typename ...Types>
146  physx::PxJoint* createJoint_impl(const Types&... types) {
147  // Instantiate the physx joint of the correct type
148  physx::PxJoint* joint;
149  static_assert(std::is_same_v<EnumType, PhysicsJointType>);
150  if constexpr (EnumValue == PhysicsJointType::kFixed) {
151  joint = physx::PxFixedJointCreate(*PhysicsManager::Physics(), types...);
152  }
153  else if constexpr (EnumValue == PhysicsJointType::kSpherical) {
154  joint = physx::PxSphericalJointCreate(*PhysicsManager::Physics(), types...);
155  }
156  else if constexpr (EnumValue == PhysicsJointType::kRevolute) {
157  joint = physx::PxRevoluteJointCreate(*PhysicsManager::Physics(), types...);
158  }
159  else if constexpr (EnumValue == PhysicsJointType::kPrismatic) {
160  joint = physx::PxPrismaticJointCreate(*PhysicsManager::Physics(), types...);
161  }
162  else if constexpr (EnumValue == PhysicsJointType::kDistance) {
163  joint = physx::PxDistanceJointCreate(*PhysicsManager::Physics(), types...);
164  }
165  else if constexpr (EnumValue == PhysicsJointType::kD6) {
166  joint = physx::PxD6JointCreate(*PhysicsManager::Physics(), types...);
167  }
168  else {
169  Logger::Throw("Error, unimplemented physics joint type");
170  }
171 
172  // Associate the physx joint with this PhysicsJoint
173  joint->userData = this;
174 
175  return joint;
176  }
177 
178  bool checkJoint() const { if (!m_pJoint) Logger::Throw("Error, no joint found"); }
179 
181 
182  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
185 
186  physx::PxJoint* m_pJoint;
187 
189 
190 };
